place: Via Monte Brianzo 51, IVÂ°, Rome, Italy
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Sir, I send you back by this post the proofs of Chamber Music with corrections. If you will be kind enough to let me have a second proof I shall return it by the same post. Is it necessary to insert the note I spoke of saying that some of the verses had appeared in journals? If so, I can prefix it to the second proof. Faithfully yours James Joyce
